= Introduction =

Basic install instructions for a windows box 

Last followed 18/12/09

= Details =

Current install instructions:
  # Install python 2.6 
    # Download python-2.6.4.msi 
    # Run installer.  Choose to install to c:\python\26
  # Install genshi
    # Download Genshi-0.5.1.win32-py2.6.exe
    # Run installer.
  # Install Twisted 
    # Download Twisted-9.0.0.win32-py2.6.exe
    # Run installer
  # Install Win32 extensions
    # Download pywin32-214.win32-py2.6.exe
    # Run installer
  # Copy the source code to a directory
  # Run `mtWindowsServer` to install the service
  # Configure the service as required
    # Rememeber the service uses the `mailThrottler.ini` in the same directory as a config file
  # Run !
